definitions: the process of taming an animal and keeping it as a pet or on a farm

examples.text: domestication of animals lies at the heart of human civilization

shortDefinitions: process of taming animal and keeping it as pet or on farm

definitions: the cultivation of a plant for food

examples.text: this book covers the evolution and domestication of six important cereal crops

definitions: the process of making someone fond of and good at home life and the tasks that it involves

examples.text: I won't say it was an easy change, but my domestication was a much needed one

shortDefinitions: process of making someone fond of and good at home life
